Class Review

java.lang.Object
proiect.claseUser.Review
public class Review extends Object
Represents a review entry associated with a user and a book. This class provides methods to manage and persist reviews to the database.

  • Constructor Details

    • Review

      public Review(String review, int rating, int idUser, int idCarte)
      Constructs a new Review object with specified review text, rating, user ID, and book ID.
      Parameters:
      review - the text of the review
      rating - the rating value associated with the review
      idUser - the unique identifier of the user submitting the review
      idCarte - the unique identifier of the book being reviewed

  • Method Details

    • getReviewRating

      public int getReviewRating()
      Retrieves the rating value associated with the review.
      Returns:
      the integer value representing the review rating

    • getUser_idUser

      public int getUser_idUser()
      Retrieves the unique identifier of the user associated with the review.
      Returns:
      an integer representing the unique user ID

    • getReviewText

      public String getReviewText()
      Retrieves the textual content of the review.
      Returns:
      a string representing the review text

    • trimiteReview

      public void trimiteReview(Review review)
      Persists or updates a review in the database. The method inserts a new review or updates an existing review based on whether the review already exists for the specific user and book combination.
      Parameters:
      review - the review object containing the review text, rating, user ID, and book ID to be processed
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the user or book does not exist in the database or if a database-related error occurs

    • existaReview

      public boolean existaReview(Connection conn, int userId, int carteId) throws SQLException
      Checks if a review exists in the database for a specific combination of user and book.
      Parameters:
      conn - the active database connection to be used for the query
      userId - the unique identifier of the user
      carteId - the unique identifier of the book
      Returns:
      true if a review exists for the given user and book, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if any SQL errors occur during the query execution

    • SELECT_USER_FROM_REVIEWS

      public String SELECT_USER_FROM_REVIEWS(String DB_URL, String DB_USER, String DB_PASS, int userId) throws SQLException
      Executes a query to retrieve the username associated with a specified user ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      DB_URL - the database connection URL
      DB_USER - the username for database authentication
      DB_PASS - the password for database authentication
      userId - the unique identifier of the user whose username is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the username of the user if found, or an empty string if no user exists with the given ID
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs or the query fails
